title: Mobile-Based Neonatal Nursing Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning using personal mobile devices combined with instructor feedback sessions

learning_goals: Learners can perform newborn physical examination procedures via a mobile application simulation with 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify ten newborn danger signs and explain emergency response protocols.
Learners can establish and evaluate newborn nutrition management plans through virtual cases within a mobile app.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
